title: Tesla Austin Layoffs 2025
content: Tesla filed a WARN notice affecting 500 employees at its Austin, Texas manufacturing facility. The layoffs are expected to take effect on February 15, 2025.

title: Meta Menlo Park Layoffs 2025
content: Meta announced workforce reductions impacting 300 employees at its Menlo Park headquarters. The layoffs are part of a broader restructuring initiative scheduled for March 1, 2025.

title: Amazon Seattle WARN Notice 2025
content: Amazon submitted a WARN notice for 450 corporate employees at its Seattle campus. The affected positions span multiple departments with separations beginning February 28, 2025.

title: Google Mountain View Layoffs 2025
content: Google filed a WARN notice affecting 275 employees at its Mountain View headquarters. The layoffs are expected to occur on March 15, 2025 as part of organizational changes.

title: Microsoft Redmond WARN Notice 2025
content: Microsoft issued a WARN notice impacting 350 employees at its Redmond, Washington campus. The workforce reduction is scheduled to take effect on February 20, 2025.
